thread.title: CW Cancels Beauty and the Beast
thread.title_full: CW Cancels Beauty and the Beast

title: CW Cancels Beauty and the Beast
text: CW Cancels Beauty and the Beast Wednesday, 14 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) The CW gave the Kristin Kreuk and Jay Ryan drama an early Season 4 renewal months before its shortened third season premiered this summer. [...] though the series never garnered huge ratings, its most recent season only averaged 879,000 viewers, drastically down from its Season 1 average of 1.61 million. Beauty and the Beast's final season is expected to premiere in 2016.
